snippet.title: Hegemone Pass - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Queen of the Underworld is no more! Long live the Queen! The goddess Persephone had her title stolen by Demeter and her powerful followers, the Eleusinian Mysteries. Take back your title and reign in this leader focused turn-based JRPG set deep in the platformer-lite Greek Underworld! Designate and switch leaders to empower allies or oppress foes using their acquired titles of four types: Team! Leader! Fear! Target! Explore the 2D land of the dead filled with adorable characters and battle its denizens and gods who obey the new Queen.

Coming to Windows PC & Linux in 2019.

Website: http://hegemonepass.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/HegemonePass
